import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const BoxScore = (data) => { const instance = data.props; const fgp_vls = Math.round((instance.vls.tstsg.fgm / instance.vls.tstsg.fga) * 100) + '%'; const fgp_hls = Math.round((instance.hls.tstsg.fgm / instance.hls.tstsg.fga) * 100) + '%'; const tpp_vls = Math.round((instance.vls.tstsg.tpm / instance.vls.tstsg.tpa) * 100) + '%'; const tpp_hls = Math.round((instance.hls.tstsg.tpm / instance.hls.tstsg.tpa) * 100) + '%'; const ftp_vls = Math.round((instance.vls.tstsg.ftm / instance.vls.tstsg.fta) * 100) + '%'; const ftp_hls = Math.round((instance.hls.tstsg.ftm / instance.hls.tstsg.fta) * 100) + '%'; return (
{/* Away */} {/* Home */}
Team Q1 Pts Q2 Pts Q3 Pts Q4 Pts OT Pts FT Out ST Out FG% TP% FT% OREB DREB STL BLK FL TOV PIP
{instance.vls.ta} {instance.vls.q1} {instance.vls.q2} {instance.vls.q3} {instance.vls.q4} {instance.vls.ot ? instance.vls.ot : 'N/A'} {instance.vls.ftout} {instance.vls.stout} { fgp_vls } { tpp_vls } { ftp_vls } {instance.vls.tstsg.oreb} {instance.vls.tstsg.dreb} {instance.vls.tstsg.stl} {instance.vls.tstsg.blk} {instance.vls.tstsg.pf} {instance.vls.tstsg.tov} {instance.vls.tstsg.pip ? instance.vls.tstsg.pip : 0}
{instance.hls.ta} {instance.hls.q1} {instance.hls.q2} {instance.hls.q3} {instance.hls.q4} {instance.hls.ot ? instance.hls.ot : 'N/A'} {instance.hls.ftout} {instance.hls.stout} { fgp_hls } { tpp_hls } { ftp_hls } {instance.hls.tstsg.oreb} {instance.hls.tstsg.dreb} {instance.hls.tstsg.stl} {instance.hls.tstsg.blk} {instance.hls.tstsg.pf} {instance.hls.tstsg.tov} {instance.hls.tstsg.pip ? instance.hls.tstsg.pip : 0}
); } export default BoxScore;
